gcci.text: With H100 spot averages around $3.09/hr, hyperscalers are locking in long‑term supply while Chinese labs contend with export constraints, accelerating a shift to domestic accelerators and reshaping capex allocation across the supply chain.

gtpi.text: At an average input price near $1.25/1M tokens, the API price war is compressing margins and forcing providers to differentiate on throughput, caching, and context windows rather than headline price alone.

gagl.text: With data center load around 120 TWh/yr, the grid is feeling the strain; developers are increasingly turning to SMRs, high‑efficiency cooling, and on‑site renewables to curb carbon footprints while keeping latency targets on track.

aipi.text: AI sentiment remains buoyant but guarded as cost‑compression and power constraints pressure growth; sustainability and hardware efficiency are now central to long‑term viability.
